title: The Chinese painting and calligraphy club

content.question: You will participate in simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Wang Tianming, faculty adviser to the Chinese painting and calligraphy club at your school, about your application to serve as president of the club. Response 1

frqParts.text: You will participate in simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with Wang Tianming, faculty adviser to the Chinese painting and calligraphy club at your school, about your application to serve as president of the club. Response 1

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
